title: Baroness Kidron: Government uses 'shield and sympathy' of child ­sexual abuse to access encrypted messages
text:
A leading child safety campaigner says the Government is using “the shield and sympathy” of child ­sexual abuse as an excuse to access encrypted messages.

Baroness Kidron, chairman of the 5Rights Foundation, said it is intentionally “conflating the issues” to open a “backdoor” into private communications. The Government wants tech to let it access encrypted messages and claims encryption helps cyber criminals.

A statement from the Five Eyes alliance of the UK, US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand last year said they “encourage information and communications technology service providers to voluntarily establish lawful access solutions to their products”.
